about.title: Who Am I ?
about.description2: , and I am also trying to become a
about.description3: I'm also an IT student at DUT. Luckily, in my second year of university, I found an internship to learn, test my skills, and improve.
about.description4: I am always grateful to the mentors who have dedicatedly helped me in my development and self-improvement.
about.description5: I am still trying to better myself. Whatever I know, I share wholeheartedly, hoping to be of help to others in some way.
about.description6: Oh, this place is where I write down my knowledge, personal experiences, and various stories. If you're interested, feel free to drop by.

contacts.description1: Hi, I'm a bit hesitant to leave my bank account information here,
contacts.description2: However, if you find my blogs and the knowledge I share interesting, feel free to send me 'a cup of coffee'.
contacts.description3: Your support is both funding to maintain this and motivation for me to write more interesting blogs.

experiences.description1: Everything I have learned and done is summarized here!

overview.title: TECHNICAL PROFILE
overview.description1: I have over 2 years of experience in building and developing Websites or Web-based applications.
overview.description2: I have experience working with technologies/languages such as ReactJS, NextJS, React Native, Material UI, Tailwinds, Antd, HTML5, SCSS, Typescript, etc.
overview.description3: I have experience in responsive layouts, cross-browser and design layout using Figma, etc.
overview.description4: I have also used and worked with Backend technologies/languages such as ExpressJS, NestJS.
overview.description5: I have experience using Github, Gitlab.
overview.description6: In terms of foreign languages, I can use English in the workplace, understand documents and communicate in English.

experiences.title: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
experiences.subTitle: DANANG UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

mld.title: Mullion
mld.subTitle: WEB APP
mld.description: Developed an application consisting of two systems: one system manages functions such as users, customers, stocks, statistics, investments, expenditures, etc.; the other system allows users to buy investment stocks, build their own investment funds, manage the purchase/sale of stocks, etc.

umex.title: Diamond - UMEX
umex.subTitle: WEB APP
umex.description: Developed an application consisting of two systems: one system manages functions such as users, customers, stocks, statistics, investments, expenditures, etc.; the other system allows users to buy investment stocks, build their own investment funds, manage the purchase/sale of stocks, etc.

step.title: Step Travel
step.subTitle: WEB APP
step.description: Developed an application consisting of two systems: one system manages functions such as users, customers, managing tours, booking, service provision, billing, payments, etc.; the other system allows users to book tours, use the system's services, make payments and a host of other services.

hp.title: Dipro Tech
hp.subTitle: WEB APP
hp.description: Developed a 'Landing Page' application for businesses, helping to optimize advertising campaigns and improve customer conversion rates, promoting the company's services and products to potential customers.

face.title: Face Analysis
face.subTitle: WEB APP
face.description: Developed a face analysis system that helps aesthetic clinics manage user information, analyze and compare images before and after surgery, as well as draw lines on the face to depict post-surgery results and other aesthetic functions, etc.
